sources.title: Hi Diddle Diddle
sources.description: The bride's mother is swindled out of her money and the groom's father cooks up a scheme to make things right. Mystic Nights Videos

sources.title: Hi Diddle Diddle (1943)
sources.description: When the bride's mother is supposedly swindled out of her money by a spurned suitor, the groom's father orchestrates a scheme of his own to set things right. He is aided by a cabaret singer, while placating a jealous wife. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hi-diddle-diddle-1943/

sources.title: Hi Diddle Diddle (1943) ADOLPHE MENJOU
sources.description:
Stars: Adolphe Menjou, Martha Scott, Pola Negri
Director: Andrew L. Stone

When the bride's mother is supposedly swindled out of her money by a spurned suitor, the groom's father orchestrates a scheme of his own to set things right.

sources.title: Hi Diddle Diddle (1943) Comedy, Musical Full Length Movie
sources.description:
When the bride's mother is supposedly swindled out of her money by a spurned suitor, the groom's father orchestrates a scheme of his own to set things right. He is aided by a cabaret singer, while placating a jealous wife.

Directors: Andrew L. Stone, Friz Freleng 
Writers: Frederick J. Jackson, Edmund L. Hartmann 
Stars: Adolphe Menjou, Martha Scott, Pola Negri 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Musical
